description.en:
Not all job classes are created equal!

Marnac was pulled into a game while trying to play as one of its worst job classes, Cleric of Decay. Now he’s the only cleric of the Order of Decay, serving a goddess who’s been reduced to an animated hand that repeats the word “MURDER!”

Will the Order’s last cleric become powerful enough before the prophecy of “the end” comes true?

altTitles.ja: 伝説の男の娘もっこり配信者

description.en:
A femboy shows off his bulge on a livestream!!

However, it gets even more popular than he expected?!

---

* Alternative Official Raw - [Twitter](https://twitter.com/mukunozaltusou/status/1844651030761685297)
description.id: Seorang cowok cantik mencoba mengolok-olok penonton om-om dengan Steaming sambil cross-dressing dan memamerkan tubuh montoknya!! Namun, tidak disangka dia mendapatkan popularitas karena hal lain...!?
description.ja:
配信でもっこりを見せつける男の娘‼

しかし、それが以外にも人気が出てしまい…⁉

description.en:
Talk about being at the wrong place at the wrong time! High school student Kazuki Muto had no clue what he was in for when he rescued damsel in distress Tokiko from a monster known as a "homunculus." Disguised as humans–who actually eat humans–homunculi are malevolent creatures that affix themselves to people's brains, and once fully grown, the only thing that can annihilate them is a weapon called Buso Renkin! Follow the adventures of Kazuki after he discovers that it was actually Tokiko who saved his life by implanting a kakugane–an alchemical device that transforms into a buso renkin–to replace his heart!


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media

altTitles.vi: Nhất quỷ nhì ma, thứ ba Takagi

altTitles.ja: からかい上手の高木さん

altTitles.es: La Maestra de las Bromas: Takagi - San

altTitles.th: แกล้งนัก รักนะ รู้ยัง?

altTitles.tl: Ang magaling sa pang-aasar na si Takagi

description.en:
*If you blush, you lose!*  Living by this principle, the middle schooler Nishikata gets constantly made fun of by his seat neighbour Takagi-san. With his pride shattered to pieces, he vows to turn the tables and get back at her someday.   And so, he attempts to tease her day after day, only to find himself falling victim to Takagi-san's ridicule again sooner than later. Will he be able to make Takagi-san blush from embarrassment even once in the end? English Chapters have been renumbered to their tank numbers, where applicable.*

---
- **Won the 66th Shogakukan Manga Award for Shonen in 2021**
description.id: Komik ini bercerita tentang seorang siswa Sekolah Menengah Nishikata dan Takagi duduk bersebelahan di kelas. Takagi menikmati menggoda Nishikata dengan lelucon dan lelucon yang memalukan. Sebagai tanggapan, Nishikata membuat rencana untuk membalas dendam, tetapi dia gagal ketika dia mengidentifikasi kelemahannya dan memanfaatkannya. Dalam beberapa kasus langka di mana Takagi kehilangan tantangan, Nishikata tidak merasa seperti dia benar-benar menang. Pengaturan ini didasarkan pada kota Tonoshou di Prefektur Kagawa.
description.tl: "Kapag namula ka, talo ka." Ito na ang hindi nakasulat na patakaran na itinakda sa pagitan ng dalawa mula pa noong nagkakilala sila sa hayskul. Araw-araw, talo pagkatapos ng talo, nagsusumikap si Nishikata na makita si Takagi na mamumula sa kahihiyan, ngunit ang kanyang mga walang saysay na pagtatangka ay nagreresulta lamang sa higit pang panunuya. Sa kabila ng mabisyo na siklo ng pagtatangkang talunin ang isa't isa, magbabago pa kaya ang kanilang relasyon?
description.zh:
“脸红，你就输了！”
	
「今天一定要捉弄高木同学，让她害羞！」
某所中学，在各种方面都被邻座的女生高木同学捉弄的男生西片。
他为了对此反击而每天奋斗，但……？
这样的高木同学与西片带来的
全力「捉弄」青春大战开始了！
description.pt-br: Takagi-san, essa é a garota que se senta ao meu lado, sempre me provocando. Mas você vai ver, hoje é o dia que eu vou dar o troco e envergonhá-la!!

description.en:
The story of two foreign men living in Japan.

(from ebookjapan):

Nick, with his stylish hair, and Lever, with his dazzling eyes behind his sunglasses, are a HOT & CRAZY foreign duo who will face any obstacles that come their way! 

The genius Kyogoro Miyata, who wastes no time in drawing, unleashes a shocking high-speed manga. Nick and Lever are finally here!
description.es-la: Esta es la historia de dos extranjeros que viven en Japón: Nick, con su elegante melena, y Lever, con sus deslumbrantes ojos que se ocultan detrás de sus gafas de sol. Este alocado dúo se enfrentará a cualquier obstáculo que se les presente mientras tratan de sobrevivir día a día en la tierra del sol naciente.

title.en: I Don't Want to Play Matchmaker!

altTitles.en: I Don't Want to Be a Magpie Bridge
I Don't Want to Be an Ojakgyo
I Don't Want to Be the Magpie Bridge

description.en:
I’ve been reincarnated into a side character of a novel. On top of that, I am the character who is like a magpie bridge in the mentally-exhausting story, *The Guys Around Hestia*.

There is no romance in store for me, and it absolutely horrifies me to think that my family is destined to drown in debt!

I planned on becoming a civil servant, enjoying a life of wealth and honor that I was unable to attain in my previous life but… why are the guys behaving out of character? Why are you blushing in front of me? Why do you keep giving me food?

“Can you Imagine Shushu being shy when looking at someone?”

“Whoa… It’d be amazing if that happens.”

As Cory absent-mindedly said that to Hiley, Eve frowned and murmured under his breath, “Should I run away with her…”

Swan remained silent while he hid his face with his sleeves. His face and ears turned red.

What’s up with you guys? Why are you guys doing other things instead of being obsessed with the female lead? Get yourself together!

This is the survival story of an academy student, Schulaina West, who wants to pursue a wealthy future in a reverse harem novel. 

TL/N: Magpie Bridge is the bridge made by a flock of magpies that connects the two star-crossed lovers Orihime and Hikoboshi in the legend behind the Tanabata festival.

title.en: Kuroiwa Medaka ni Watashi no Kawaii ga Tsuujinai

altTitles.en: Medaka Kuroiwa is Impervious to My Charms
My Charms Are Wasted on Medaka Kuroiwa

altTitles.ja: 黒岩メダカに私の可愛いが通じない

altTitles.ru: Куроива Мэдака не понимает моей привлекательности

altTitles.es-la: Mis encantos no funcionan con Kuroiwa Medaka

altTitles.zh: 我的可爱对黑岩目高不管用

description.en:
Kuroiwa Medaka was born in a temple and is currently a monk in training. Because of his temple's rules, he can't interact with girls - and what's more, he doesn't even know how to regularly socialize with them. Mona, the "queen bee" of the school, however insistently tries to make him fall in love with her, but he always ignores her in order to maintain the rules of his temple.

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10032/episode/312982) (U.S. Only)
description.fr:
Tu ne le sais pas encore, mais tu m’adores !

Mona plaît à tout le monde, c’est comme ça. Son sourire, son allure, sa personnalité… Tout chez elle attire les gens. Dans son lycée, elle fait tourner toutes les têtes. Sauf celle d’un garçon… Medaka. Fraîchement admis dans son école, celui-ci a complètement chamboulé la vie de cette fille à qui nul ni personne n’est censé résister. C’est bien simple : Medaka refuse de la regarder ou se renfrogne à la moindre de ses tentatives de rapprochement. Devant cette insulte à son charme ravageur, Mona décide de tout mettre en œuvre pour le séduire, quitte à se mettre dans des situations où elle-même ne saura plus quoi ressentir ! La tombeuse VS l’insensible : qui craquera en premier ? 

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Pika**
description.ja:
オチないアイツに、最強モテ女が大奮闘！「アイツのことなんて、ぜんっぜん好きじゃないないのに！！」

容姿端麗！ スタイル抜群！ 川井モナは、息をするようにモテる女!!　しかし、そんな彼女に見向きもしない転校生・黒岩メダカの登場で、モナの学校生活は一変する！　「今までずっと、チヤホヤされて生きてきたのに!!」あの手この手でメダカをオトそうと大奮闘！　時にはちょっぴりカゲキなことも!?　
モテ女子×禁欲男子のラブコメディ、大勃発――!!
description.ru: Куроива Мэдака родился в храме и в настоящее время является монахом, проходящим обучение. Из-за правил своего храма он не может общаться с девушками и более того, он даже не знает, как с ними общаться. Мона, "королева пчёл" школы, однако настойчиво пытается заставить его влюбиться в неё, но он всегда игнорирует её, чтобы сохранить правила своего храма.
description.es-la:
La mujer más popular del mundo lucha contra un tipo que no le gusta. ¡Ni siquiera me gusta en absoluto!

¡Buena apariencia! Estilo excepcional! ¡Kawai Mona es una mujer impresionante! Sin embargo, con la aparición de un estudiante transferido, Kuroiwa Medaka, que ni siquiera la mira, ¡la vida escolar de Mona cambiará por completo! "  Ella se ha pasado toda su vida siendo consentida y ha hecho todo lo posible por ganarse a Medaka que aveces pueder un poco radical.

¡La comedia romantica de una chica popular y un chico abstinente está a punto de estallar!
description.pt-br: Kuroiwa nasceu em um templo e atualmente é um monge em treinamento. Por causa das regras do seu templo, ele não pode interagir com garotas - e mais, nem mesmo sabe como fazer isso. Mona, a "abelha rainha" da escola, insistentemente tenta fazê-lo se apaixonar por ela, mas ele sempre a ignora a fim de se manter íntegro quanto as regras do seu templo.

description.en:
A man relaxing with a can of beer when a winter storm hits. A man, burdened with personal strife, finds solace in a bowl of ramen. 

A Silent Manga, each chapter is a self-contained glimpse into the life of an ordinary person, and how the meals they eat lift their spirits.

altTitles.ja: ふしぎねこのきゅーちゃん

description.en:
There’s more to this kitty than meets the eye! Kyuu-chan loves snacks, cuddles, and bow ties, but most of all loves Hinata, the young professional who adopted this mischievous wonder cat into his home.

As the two adjust to life together, they discover that they have a lot to learn from each other.

The ordinary and the extraordinary live side by side in this delightful slice-of-life manga!

---

- **[Official English license announcement](https://sevenseasentertainment.com/2020/08/28/seven-seas-isnt-kitten-around-with-license-of-wondercat-kyuu-chan-manga-series/)**

- **[ManiManiTV YouTube channel](https://www.youtube.com/c/ManiManiTV/videos/), Official Kyuu-chan motion comic videos:** [#1,](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zCBZUbEbI-w) [#2,](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wSJURvGO494) [#3](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ytJbXHsqikw)…
description.ro: O manga adorabilă color despre un tânăr ce salvează o pisică foarte specială. Dar pisica asta nu e ceea ce pare! Kyuu-chan iubeste mâncarea, îmbrățișările și fundele, dar cel mai mult, îl iubește pe Hinata, tânărul care l-a adoptat. Pe măsură ce se obișnuiesc să trăiască împreună, ei descoperă că au mult de învățat unul de la celălalt. Vedeți viața ordinară și extraordinară pe care cei doi o trăiesc în această minunată slice-of-life manga pentru toți iubitorii de animale și nu numai!
description.ru: Милая история о повседневной жизни бездомного котика Кю и человека, который решает его приютить.
description.pt-br: Hinata é um jovem trabalhador que leva uma vida mundana. No meio de uma tempestade de neve, ele acha um gato abandonado passando frio em uma caixa de papelão, e decide o levar pra casa. O que Hinata não sabia é que ele tinha acabado de pegar o melhor gato de todos!

altTitles.ja: ビー・バップ・ハイスクール

description.en:
The story revolves around the lives of two rough-and-tumble high school friends Kato Hiroshi and Nakama Toru, who seemed to make a habit of getting into trouble and starting up fights. In keeping with the spirit of the manga, Toru and Hiroshi sport slicked back 50's style ducktails and adopted exaggerated swaggers that made them comical and yet also oddly cool. The drama also features an assortment of outlandish characters who sport even weirder fashions and hairdos. To describe the action in this drama, think Fight Club meets The Breakfast Club.  
  
---
 - **Won the 12th Kodansha Manga Award for General Manga in 1988, which it shared with Bonobono**

altTitles.th: ขบวนการกำมะลอ

description.en:
Thirteen years ago, suddenly the Villainous Army of evil appeared in their gigantic floating castle 10000 meters in the sky to invade Earth!

The villainous army have reviving capabilities that make them immortal, making them a serious threat to humanity. To protect us against these invaders, the Divine Dragon Rangers, the Dragon Keepers, wield their miraculous powers and their weapons, Divine Tools, and continuously fight for our safety!

The assault of the Villainous Army! The vigilance of the Dragon Keepers! Will they succeed in their conquest…?

From Haruba Negi, the creator of *5Toubun no Hanayome*, comes the action-packed superhero series of a lifetime!
description.es: ¡Hace trece años, el Ejército Villano del mal apareció de repente en su gigantesco castillo flotante a 10.000 metros en el cielo para invadir la Tierra! El ejército villano tiene capacidades de revivir que los hacen inmortales, lo que los convierte en una seria amenaza para la humanidad. Para protegernos de estos invasores, los Rangers Dragón Divino, los Guardianes del Dragón, empuñan sus poderes milagrosos y sus armas, las Herramientas Divinas, ¡y luchan continuamente por nuestra seguridad! ¡El asalto del Ejército Villano! ¡La vigilancia de los Guardianes del Dragón! ¿Tendrán éxito en su conquista? ¡Descúbrelo en la serie de superhéroes llena de acción de toda la vida!
description.fr:
Il y a 13 ans, un château flottant est apparu à 1000 mètres au-dessus du sol et une armée maléfique est venue dans le but d'envahir l'humanité.
Afin de protéger l'humanité contre ces envahisseurs, des super-héros se battent, mais les choses ne semblent pas être comme elles le paraissent !
description.ru: Тринадцать лет назад армия монстров таинственным образом объявилась на территории людей, паря в воздухе на своем летучем замке! Армия монстров обладает различными способностями, которые могут грозить человеческой безопасности. Дабы защитить мирных жителей от вторжения на землю, доблестные герои - Хранители Дракона в составе из пяти человек выходят на поле правосудия! Используя свой туз в рукаве под названием «артефакт», боевой отряд героев из года в год, каждое воскресенье усмиряет неугомонных монстров. Однако, спустя 999 поражений, один из членов команды монстров решает отомстить героям!.. С этого момента и разворачивается наша история борьбы добра со злом!
description.pt-br: Há treze anos, de repente, o Infame Exército do mal apareceu em seu gigantesco castelo flutuante 10.000 metros no céu para invadir a Terra! O exército vilão tinha capacidades de reviver, o que os tornava imortais, tornando-os uma séria ameaça para a humanidade. Para nos proteger contra esses invasores, os Divine Dragon Rangers, os Dragon Keepers, manejam seus poderes milagrosos e suas armas, Ferramentas Divinas, e lutam continuamente por nossa segurança! O ataque do Exército Vilão! A vigilância dos Dragon Keepers! Eles terão sucesso em sua conquista...?

title.en: Isekai de Haishin Katsudou wo Shitara Tairyou no Yandere Shinja wo Umidashite Shimatta Ken

altTitles.ja: 異世界で配信活動をしたら大量のヤンデレ信者を生み出してしまった件

altTitles.en: When I Started Streaming in Another World, I Ended Up Creating a Large Number of Yandere Followers

description.en: Living in Ataraxia, a world of swords and magic, a reincarnated individual decided to make a living out of streaming. Living in a world where such a thing did not exist despite the many forms of entertainment, he quickly made a name for himself. This is not the tale of just a streamer... but of a boy who becomes a legend as a haishinsha.
description.ja: 剣と魔法の世界アタラシア――その世界に生きる一人の転生者が配信活動に手を出した。 数多くの娯楽はあれど、そのようなモノが存在しなかった世界で彼はたちまち有名になった。 これは異世界で唯一の配信者……ではなく、ハイシンシャになろうと考えた少年の物語である。
description.vi: Anh nhân vật chính của chúng ta được chuyển sinh sang thế giới có sự tồn tại của ma thuật. Sở hữu trong mình sức mạnh bá ko tả nổi, anh sẽ đánh bại quái vật để kiếm sống ư? Không, anh chê, anh muốn theo đuổi đam mê, anh muốn làm streamer để kiếm sống.
description.pt-br: Vivendo em Ataraxia, um mundo de espadas e magia, um indivíduo reencarnado decidiu ganhar a vida com streaming. Vivendo em um mundo onde tal coisa não existia, apesar das muitas formas de entretenimento, ele rapidamente fez um nome para si mesmo. Esta não é a história de apenas um streamer... mas de um garoto que se torna uma lenda como um haishinsha.

description.en:
Millions of years have passed since the times of legends, when the worlds of man and gods were still the same. In these times it was the desires of man that moved the world. It is the era of the 500 year war: The warring states period. Kingdom is the story of a young boy named Shin who grew into a great general and all the trials and bloodshed that lead him there.  

---
  
- **Won the Osamu Tezuka Cultural Grand Prize in 2013**
- **Earned a Guinness World Record on December 12, 2012 for Manga written by the most people. -Note- The record was due to its "Social Kingdom" campaign in which fans and other artists were given the task of redrawing the entire 26th volume.**

As of June 2022, Kingdom has over 90 million copies in circulation, making it one of the currently best-selling manga series of all time. 

Parution: Weekly Young Jump

---

**Officially Translated:**  
- In French by [Meian](https://www.meian-editions.fr/meian/licence/kingdom/1131)  
- In Italian by [J-pop](https://j-pop.it/it/fumetti/manga/kingdom.html)
description.fr:
**Cette Histoire se déroule avant notre ère.**

La chine, qui n'est pas encore unifiée, traverse une grande guerre de cinq siècles. Shin, un jeune garçon contemporain de ces temps violents et houleux, cherche, par la seule force de son épée, à se faire un nom sous les cieux !!!
___
**Kingdom en France, le manga tant attendu ! Véritable phénomène au Japon !**
- Élu meilleur manga au 17e Grand Prix Culturel Osamu Tezuka (2013)
- Meilleur manga seinen vendu au Japon depuis 2015 (source : Oricon)
- 3ème meilleur manga vendu au Japon en 2016 et 2017 (source : Oricon)
description.uk: Мільйони років минуло з часів легенд, коли світ людей і богів був єдиним. У ті часи бажання людини верховодило над світом. Це була епоха 500-річної війни, період ворожих держав. «Королівство» — історія про хлопчину на ім’я Сінь, котрий прагне стати найвеличнішим генералом та про безліч випробувань та скитань, повз які пролягатиме його шлях до мети.
description.pt-br: Milhões de anos se passaram desde os tempos de lendas, quando os mundos dos homens e deuses ainda eram os mesmos. Nestes tempos eram os desejos do homem que mudaram o mundo. É o período da guerra de 500 anos: a Era dos Reinos Combatentes. Kingdom é a história de um garoto órfão e pobre tem o sonho de se tornar um grande general e assim começando seu caminho de provações e derramamento de sangue que o levarão até o topo das lendas!

description.en: The most powerful exorcist in history--Kiyoshi! In order to protect that which is precious to him, Kiyoshi has attained ultimate strength. But he has a secret he can't tell anyone... Become a sword that slays evil! Become a shield that protects the weak!
description.ja: 祓清は史上最強の悪祓士（エクソシスト）。弱冠16歳にして初任務にあたっていた。しかし、本当は超ビビり＋ド級の人見知りで…!?　ほんの少しの勇気を胸に、悪魔を祓え!!
description.es-la: El exorcista más poderoso de la historia--¡Kiyoshi! Para poder proteger aquello que considera precioso, Kiyoshi ha obtenido una fuerza sin igual. Pero tiene un secreto que no puede revelar... ¡Conviértete en una espada que corta el mal! ¡Se un escudo que protege a los débiles! ¡Todo eso y más se junta en esta nueva serie de exorcismo, batallas y comedia!
description.pt-br: O exorcista mais poderoso da história: Kiyoshi Harai! Para proteger o que é precioso para ele, Kiyoshi atingiu a força suprema. Mas ele tem um segredo que não pode contar a ninguém... ele virou a espada que erradica o mal! O escudo que protege os fracos! Tudo se junta nessa nova série dramática de comédia e batalha de exorcistas!

title.en: The Exiled Heavy Knight Knows How to Game the System

altTitles.ja: 追放された転生重騎士はゲーム知識で無双する

altTitles.ja-ro: Tsuihou Sareta Tensei Juu Kishi wa Game Chishiki de Musou Suru

altTitles.en: The Exiled Reincarnated Heavy Knight Is Unrivaled in Game Knowledge

description.en:
“You good-for-nothing bastard. You are the son of a Sword Saint, yet you dare pull such a defective Class?!”

During the〈Divine Blessing Ceremony〉of the 15-year-old Elma who came from a lineage of Sword Saints, he had manifested a commonly deemed defective class known as the Heavy Knight. He had been deprived of his position as the next head of the Edvan Household and was then exiled. The Heavy Knight class had an unbalanced status and useless skills, to top it off, it was even said to be a class cowardly and indolent people have.

But, Elma knew better—that this world was the world of the game he had used to play before—and that the Heavy Knight class was the strongest class to exist. Elma made full use of the knowledge he had in his previous life and began his efficient walkthrough of the world he was reincarnated into.
description.ja: 「役立たずめ……剣聖の息子でありながら、こんな大ハズレを引こうとは！」 　十五歳の〈加護の儀〉。剣聖の血筋であるエルマは、典型的なハズレクラスである重騎士を発現し、次期当主の座を奪われて追放されてしまう。重騎士は偏ったステータスに、使い所のないスキル。挙げ句に臆病で怠惰な者が得るクラスだとまでいわれていた。 　だが、エルマは知っていた。この世界は彼が遊び尽くしたゲームの世界であり――重騎士こそが、最強のクラスであることを。エルマは生前の知識をフル活用し、この世界の効率的な攻略を始めるのだった。

altTitles.ja: 負けヒロインが多すぎる！@comic

altTitles.th: รักครั้งนี้มีคนนกเยอะไปมั้ย?!

altTitles.vi: Có Quá Nhiều Nữ Chính Thua Cuộc! @comic

description.en:
***“Huh? Who are you calling losing?”***

As the background of the class, I, Kazuhiko Nukumizu, witnessed a popular girl–Anna Yanami, getting rejected by another guy.

_“Even though he said we’ll get married. Don’t you think he’s pretty mean?”
“When did he say that?”
“When we were 4 or 5 years old.”_

That doesn’t count, right? With this, the losing heroines like Remon Yakishio from the Track and Field Club, and Chika Komari, from the literature club.

_“Nukumizu-kun. There are two types of girls. Childhood friends or cheating cats.”
“I see. Well, that’s a bold statement.”_

There’s a fortune for those who shine only after losing. Losing Heroines—The curtain to the mysterious coming-of-age story “Makeine” opens now!
___
**Character Designer:** [Imigimuru](https://mangadex.org/author/341a08ca-acbf-49a3-998a-d3451249ec43)

**Additional Links:**  
- [Alternative Official Raw](https://shogakukan-comic.jp/book-series?cd=51545)
- [Official Raw Light Novel](https://www.shogakukan.co.jp/books/09453017)
description.ja:
クラスの背景モブ高校生こと温水和彦は、男子に人気のクラスメート・八奈見杏菜が幼馴染にフラれるのを目撃してしまう。
仕方なく八奈見を慰める温水だが、それをきっかけに、様々な負け感あふれる女子たちに絡まれることになり――!?
負けヒロイン――マケインたちと辿る謎の青春が、ここに幕を開ける！
負けてこそ輝く彼女たちに、幸いあれ。
description.vi:
“Hử? Cậu gọi ai là đồ thua cuộc cơ?”

Tôi, Kazuhiko Nukumizu, một nhân vật làm nền trong lớp, chứng kiến cảnh cô nàng nổi tiếng – Anna Yanami bị một nam sinh khác từ chối.

“Dù cho cậu ấy đã từng nói bọn mình sẽ kết hôn đấy. Cậu có thấy cậu ấy quá đáng không?”

“Cậu ấy nói thế vào lúc nào vậy?”

“Hồi bọn tớ 4 hay 5 tuổi gì đó.”

Thế thì đâu có tính?

Cùng với cô nàng còn có những nữ chính thua cuộc khác như Remon Yakishio của Câu lạc bộ Điền kinh và Komari Chika từ Câu lạc bộ Văn học.

“Nukumizu-kun nè, trên đời có hai loại con gái. Một là bạn thuở nhỏ, còn lại là đồ đàn bà giựt bồ.”

“Vậy hả. Chà, một tuyên bố đầy táo bạo ha.”

Có một loại vận mệnh rằng có những người chỉ thực sự toả sáng sau khi đã thua cuộc.

Những nữ chính thua cuộc—Bức màn câu chuyện tuổi mới lớn mang tên “Makein” sẽ lật mở ngay bây giờ!
description.es-la: "¿Eh? ¿A quién llamas perdedor?" Como fondo de la clase, yo, Kazuhiko Nukumizu, fui testigo de cómo una chica popular -Anna Yanami- era rechazada por otro chico. "Aunque dijo que nos casaríamos. ¿No crees que es bastante malo?" "¿Cuándo dijo eso?" "Cuando teníamos 4 o 5 años". Eso no cuenta, ¿verdad? Con esto, las heroínas perdedoras como Remon Yakishio del Club de Atletismo, y Chika Komari, del club de literatura. "Nukumizu-kun. Hay dos tipos de chicas. Las amigas de la infancia o las gatas tramposas". "Ya veo. Bueno, esa es una declaración audaz". Hay una fortuna para los que brillan sólo después de perder. ¡Heroínas perdedoras-El telón de la misteriosa historia de madurez "Makeine" se abre ahora! ["Makeine" es la abreviación del nombre del manga]
description.pt-br: O simples, chato e sem amigos Nukumizu Kazuhiko testemunhou algo completamente desconcertante: a garota popular Yanami Anna foi colocada na friend zone por seu crush e amigo de infância! Na verdade, todas as garotas populares ao redor dele estão sendo rejeitadas da mesma forma pelos garotos de quem gostam. Sem perceber, Kazuhiko se envolve no drama do relacionamento onde todas as heroínas principais estão perdendo o amor! Ele pode manter o ânimo delas e ajudá-las a encontrar a felicidade?

description.en:
"In this realm mythological creatures roam, descendant of the nine heavens they call home." 

Sibuxiang, a mythical deer-man couch potato, is kicked out of heaven and assigned to support the mythological creatures wandering the human world. He meets and goes on adventures with his friends: the energetic, food loving Pixiu named Pipi, the fanatic moon bunny Tuye, the banished-from-heaven mouse brothers Jinjiao and Yinjiao, and many others. What kind of adventures will they take on?
description.zh:
《人间有神兽，来自九重天 》

随着科技的发展，往日威风凛凛的神兽们日子大不如前。神兽四不像奉命下凡，去解救流落人间的落魄神兽。在凡间，他遇到了走投无路的老同事天禄，不得志的酒友兔爷，被贬下凡的金银角兄弟……从此开启了一段新的旅程。

title.en: Fan ni Gachikoi Suru Idol to, Idol ni Shiotaiou na Fan.

altTitles.ja: ファンにガチ恋するアイドルと、アイドルに塩対応なファン。

altTitles.ja-ro: Fan ni Gachikoi Suru Aidoru to, Aidoru ni Shiotaiouna Fan.

altTitles.en: An Idol Who's Super in Love with Her Fan and a Fan Who's Cold to His Idol

description.en: Ririka is an unpopular idol who is in love with a fan named Suzuki. She tries various ways to get his attention, but Suzuki's reactions are always cold. However, Ririka's love is so strong that she is determined to do whatever it takes to make him look her way.
description.ja: 売れないアイドルのリリカがベタ惚れしている相手…それは、自分のファンである鈴木。あの手この手でアプローチするけれど、鈴木の反応が激薄で効いているかわからない。でも、強火な推しへの愛がチラ見えする鈴木が最高なので、今日もリリカはファンサ（奇行）を繰り返す！

description.en: Some children live in a comfortably numb world, surrounded by walls. However, one day, a kid named Tokio receives a message asking "Do you want to go outside of the outside?"    Now, from the Heaven that is starting to crumble, the children begin their adventure!
description.fa:
دنیایی پوچ که بچه‌ها در آن با رفاه کامل همراه با دیوارهایی که درون و بیرون را جدا می‌کنند، زندگی می‌کنند اما همه‌ی این‌ها زمانی تغییر می‌کند که یکی از بچه‌ها به نام تاکیو‌ پیامی با این متن دریافت می‌کند: «می‌خوای به خارج از چیزی که اون بیرونه بری؟»

حال از بهشتی که درحال نابودی است بچه‌ها ماجراجویی خود را آغاز می‌کنند.
description.fr: Dans un immense jardin coupé du monde, un groupe d'enfants jouit d'une vie douce et d'insouciance, protégé par des scientifiques. Le monde extérieur leur est inconnu mais certains d'entre eux se questionnent : qu'y a-t-il au-delà des murs de leur paradis ?Pendant ce temps, dans un Japon dévasté par un mystérieux cataclysme, Maru et Kiruko, deux adolescents de la génération post-catastrophe, tentent de survivre dans un monde désolé peuplé de pillards et de monstres difformes. Leur objectif : atteindre "le Paradis".
description.ja: 美しい壁に囲まれた世界で暮らす子供たち。少年・トキオはある日、「外の外に行きたいですか？」というメッセージを受け取る。一方、外では、マルとおねえちゃんがサバイバル生活をしながら、天国を求めて、魔境となった世界を旅している。未来の日本を「あね散歩」。
description.pt: Em um mundo pós-apocalíptico, dois jovens: Maru um garoto amigável e que esconde vários segredos; E Kiruko, uma garota impetuosa e protetora. Juntos eles vagam pelo cenário desolado em busca de um chamado "paraíso". Enquanto isso, em um outro lugar isolado do resto do mundo, vivem várias crianças sem saber do que acontece no exterior. Como essas duas histórias vão se conectar?
description.ru:
Две истории, которые непременно связаны…

Таинственный Мару — мальчик, у которого есть одна цель: найти «Рай»! На пути к ним он обрёл телохранителя — Кируко. Она тоже не так уж проста, как может показаться на первый взгляд. В этом путешествии к «Небесам» они вместе посетят много мест ушедшей эпохи и встретят разных врагов!

Токио — девочка, которая живёт за великими стенами «Небес»! Это место можно назвать раем. Вокруг высокие деревья, зеленая трава, плантации свежих овощей и даже есть небольшой водоем! Вместе с Токио здесь можно встретить и других детей, каждый из которых обладает своим особенным даром. В один из дней Токио получает сообщение: «Ты хочешь выбраться отсюда?» Кажется, с этого момента что-то странное начинает твориться в пределах «Небес»…
description.pt-br: Em um mundo pós-apocalíptico, dois jovens: Maru um garoto amigável e que esconde vários segredos; E Kiruko, uma garota impetuosa e protetora. Juntos eles vagam pelo cenário desolado em busca de um chamado "paraíso". Enquanto isso, em um outro lugar isolado do resto do mundo, vivem várias crianças sem saber do que acontece no exterior. Como essas duas histórias vão se conectar?

description.en: A wandering prince set off to break an ancient curse bewitching the Kingdom of Amaryllis by waking up its princess with a kiss of true love. However, nobody told him there were 7 princesses to kiss and he must now take responsibility by living with them while they find out why the people of Amaryllis are unable to wake up. Will they reach a happily ever after?
description.fr: Un prince errant est parti pour briser une ancienne malédiction qui ensorcelle le royaume d'Amaryllis en réveillant sa princesse par un baiser d'amour véritable. Cependant, personne ne lui a dit qu'il y avait 7 princesses à embrasser et il doit maintenant prendre ses responsabilités en vivant avec elles pendant qu'ils découvrent pourquoi les habitants d'Amaryllis sont incapables de se réveiller. Parviendront-ils à être heureux pour toujours ?
description.ru:
Герой пришел спасти спящую принцессу от проклятья злой ведьмы, но когда он добрался до места... Там оказалось 7 девушек!
Принц Рудбекии - Алек и семь принцесс, в стране, где они единственные бодрствующие, начинают свою совместную жизнь, чтобы освободить всех ото сна!
description.pt-br: Um príncipe errante partiu para quebrar uma antiga maldição que enfeitiça o Reino de Amaryllis, tentando despertar sua princesa com um beijo de amor verdadeiro. No entanto, ninguém lhe disse que havia sete princesas para beijar! Agora ele precisa assumir a responsabilidade, vivendo com elas enquanto descobrem por que o povo de Amaryllis está incapaz de despertar. Será que eles conseguirão um final feliz?

altTitles.ja: 陽下3姉妹はかまってほしい

description.en:
A slightly erotic home love comedy that unfolds under the roof of the Yoshita family!  
  
The eldest daughter, Juri, wears a swimsuit at home. The second daughter, Minori, has big natural breasts. The third daughter, Anri, loves reptiles. An adolescent boy who is an idol otaku becomes a sibling with these three girls. Under the roof of the Yoshita family, another naughty incident occurs today! [Translated by DeepL]

Growing up in the late 16th century Sengoku era Japan, Shinmen Takezou is shunned by the local villagers as a devil child due to his wild and violent nature. Running away from home with a fellow boy at age 17, Takezo joins the Toyotomi army to fight the Tokugawa clan at the Battle of Sekigahara. However, the Tokugawa win a crushing victory, leading to nearly three hundred years of Shogunate rule. Takezo and his friend manage to survive the battle and afterwards swear to do great things with their lives. However, after their paths separate, Takezo becomes a wanted criminal and must change his name and his nature in order to escape an ignoble death.  
  
**Awards:**
- Won the 24th Kodansha Manga Award in the general category in 2000.
- Won the Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize in 2002 
**Note:** was nominated for the 2003 Eisner Award in the Best Writer/Artist category.
description.es:
Creciendo en el Japón de la era Sengoku de finales del siglo XVI, Shinmen Takezou es rechazado por los aldeanos locales como un niño demonio debido a su naturaleza salvaje y violenta. A los 17 años, Takezou se escapa de casa con un compañero y se une al ejército Toyotomi para luchar contra el clan Tokugawa en la batalla de Sekigahara. Sin embargo, los Tokugawa obtienen una aplastante victoria, lo que da lugar a casi trescientos años de gobierno del Shogunato. Takezou y su amigo consiguen sobrevivir a la batalla y después juran hacer grandes cosas con sus vidas. Sin embargo, cuando sus caminos se separan, Takezou se convierte en un criminal buscado y debe cambiar su nombre y su naturaleza para escapar de una muerte innoble.  
  
**Premios:**
    - Ganó el 24º Premio Kodansha de Manga en la categoría general en 2000.
    - Ganó el Premio Cultural Tezuka Osamu en 2002
    **Nota:** fue nominado al Premio Eisner 2003 en la categoría de Mejor Escritor/Artista.
description.es-la:
Creciendo en el Japón de la era Sengoku de finales del siglo XVI, Shinmen Takezou es rechazado por los aldeanos locales como un niño demonio debido a su naturaleza salvaje y violenta. A los 17 años, Takezou se escapa de casa con un compañero y se une al ejército Toyotomi para luchar contra el clan Tokugawa en la batalla de Sekigahara. Sin embargo, los Tokugawa obtienen una aplastante victoria, lo que da lugar a casi trescientos años de gobierno del Shogunato. Takezou y su amigo consiguen sobrevivir a la batalla y después juran hacer grandes cosas con sus vidas. Sin embargo, cuando sus caminos se separan, Takezou se convierte en un criminal buscado y debe cambiar su nombre y su naturaleza para escapar de una muerte innoble.  
  
**Premios:**
    - Ganó el 24º Premio Kodansha de Manga en la categoría general en 2000.
    - Ganó el Premio Cultural Tezuka Osamu en 2002
    **Nota:** fue nominado al Premio Eisner 2003 en la categoría de Mejor Escritor/Artista.

description.en:
The Demon King was defeated. The world is at peace. But… it was too late.

Hero Albus is in a hurry. The story turns and begins again, as if naturally, from the place where it all started. The well-informed hero Albus embarks on a new adventure, where time is of the essence. 

Time-saving! Efficient adventure strategy! When recruiting a priest, be forceful! It doesn’t matter if you are mistaken for a new kind of scam. And suddenly, he challenges an S-class dangerous monster. 

Hero Albus seeks to reclaim the future he desires from the past in this ultra-fast readventure (real-time attack) fantasy!
description.vi:
Ma vương đã bị đánh bại... Thế giới sẽ hòa bình trở lại. Nhưng... Đã quá muộn rồi... Anh hùng Albus thật sự đang rất vội. Câu chuyện tua ngược, như thể một cách tự nhiên, trở lại nơi mọi chuyện khởi đầu.

Người anh hùng đầy hiểu biết Albus với đôi mắt lờ đờ như thiếu ngủ, dấn thân vào một cuộc phiêu lưu mới, nơi “thời gian là thứ quan trọng nhất”.

Được đăng dài kỳ trên Weekly Shounen Sunday, nơi đã đăng tải siêu phẩm “Thám tử lừng danh Conan”, người Anh hùng Albus tìm cách giành lại tương lai mà anh ấy mong muốn từ quá khứ trong thế giới fantasy “speedrun” một cách đúng nghĩa này!
description.es-la: El Rey Demonio es derrotado... El mundo está en paz. Pero fue demasiado tarde... El héroe Albus tiene prisa. La historia da vueltas y comienza de nuevo desde el principio, como si fuera algo natural. ¡Esta es una fantasía de re-aventura de alta velocidad donde "el tiempo es lo más importante" para el experto héroe Albus.

title.en: VRMMO Chronicles of a Solo Cleric ~Surprise! I’m Actually a Berserker!~

altTitles.ja: ソロ神官のVRMMO冒険記 〜どこから見ても狂戦士です本当にありがとうございました〜

altTitles.en: VRMMO Chronicles of a Solo Cleric ~No Matter How You Look At It, It's a Berserker! Thank You So Much~

altTitles.ja-ro: Solo Shinkan no VRMMO Boukenki: Doko kara Mite mo Berserker desu Hontou ni Arigatou Gozaimashita

description.en:
~ No matter how you look at it, It’s a berserker! Thank you so much~
The high schooler Ryuu has started playing the popular VRMMORPG [Fantasic Epoch Online] FEO. He choose to be a priest because of their ability to heal themselves and hence won’t require a party. Even though he was just enjoying the game in his own way, he equips 2 maces and is even able to defeat monsters with his bare hands. His playstyle has made other players to be terrified of him! There’s no way we can take our eyes of this priest! The start of the Solo Player Priest (LUL) Journey!

---

Note: Fantasic is an intentional typo

altTitles.en: Creepy Cat ~ My Strange Daily Life with a Cat ~

altTitles.ja: CreepyCat 猫と私の奇妙な生活

altTitles.ms: Kucing Seram - Kehidupan seharian yang pelik bersama kucing.

altTitles.uk: Моторошний кіт - Моє дивне життя з котиком

altTitles.ro: Pisica Ciudată - Viața Mea Zilnică cu o Pisică Ciudată

description.en: Flora just moved to an old house, but there's already a creepy cat living there. That's when their mysterious cohabitation began.
description.uk: Флора тільки-но переїхала до старого будинку, але тут вже живе моторошний котик. Відтоді й почалось їхнє таємниче співіснування.

title.en: In no Hunter wa SSS-Kyuu Akuma to Keiyaku Suru

altTitles.ja: 陰のハンターはSSS級悪魔と契約する

altTitles.ja-ro: In no Hunter wa SSS-Kyuu Akuma to Keiyaku Suru

altTitles.en: The Shadow Hunter Makes a Deal With an SSS Class Demon

description.en: One day, the world was invaded by "demons" that appeared from a gate. Humans, who made contracts with the "Divine Spirits," a race destroyed by the demons, gained supernatural powers and began fighting against the demons. Makoto Asuka, who had become a Hunter, had been a shadowed figure for two years as no Divine Spirit had appeared for him. However, in front of him appeared a beautiful girl who sought a contract. But it turns out she's not a Divine Spirit, but a demon...!?

altTitles.ja: 日陰のアミル 追放されて無双する最強弓使い【タテスク】

description.en:
Amir Waker is an archer who’s been banished from an S-Rank party [The Band of Prodigies], which mainly consisted of nobles. 

He falsifies his identity and registered himself as an F-Rank adventurer. He took an escort quest to the countryside. The quest was supposed to be an easy task for him as a former S-Rank. But surprisingly, the client of this quest is none other than the 3rd princess who’s being targeted for some certain reasons! 

Will Amir be able to escort the princess safely from the [strongest] knight’s division of the kingdom? Amir is thus dragged into the political struggles and conflicts of the kingdom.

Ryunosuke Takagi, once known as the "Invincible Dragon" and the strongest brawler, is now a bedridden old man living with his grandson, Kent. Kent, who is bullied and forced to run errands for delinquents, struggles daily with his unfortunate circumstances. However, one day, an unexpected tragedy and miracle strike simultaneously, changing everything!
description.ja: 〝無敵の龍〟と呼ばれた喧嘩最強の男、鷹木龍之介。今は寝たきりの老人と化した彼と暮らす孫のケント。不良たちのパシリとしていじめられ、苦悩するケントに、ある日、思いもよらない悲劇と奇跡が同時に訪れることにーー!!　いじめられっ子が巻き起こす人生逆転〈喧嘩〉アクション!!

title.en: Kono Kuni wa Mou Owari da yo:  Nihon Dasshutsu Shite Isekai de Yarinaosu

altTitles.ja: この国はもう終わりだよ～日本脱出して異世界でやり直す～

altTitles.ja-ro: Kono Kuni wa Mou Owari da yo  ~Nihon Dasshutsu Shite Isekai de Yarinaosu~

altTitles.en: This Country is Finished: Escaping Japan to Start over in Another World

description.en:
Hajime, who was reincarnated into another world, catches the attention of a bored god of that world and begins to gain cheat-like skills.

However, this world is stagnant in many ways with unfairness running rampant. Feeling frustrated, one day Hajime mutters the words, “This country is already done for”—the same words he once spoke while in Japan.

Just like in Japan, things in this other world seem to be falling apart. But unlike before, Hajime now has cheat skills, and in this world, it’s allowed to use strength to correct injustices.

This country may be doomed, but he’s determined to make things right through power. With his newfound abilities, Hajime resolves to build a place where he and those around him can live in peace

title.en: IseGure - Isekai Cheat Musou Ore TUEEE-kei Ikiri Tenseisha ni Kamaseinu ni sare Tsuzuketa Elite Kishi, Chou Gureru.

altTitles.ja: イセグレ　異世界チート無双　俺ＴＵＥＥＥ系イキリ転生者にかませ犬にされ続けたエリート騎士、超グレる。

altTitles.ja-ro: IseGure - Isekai Cheat Musou Ore Tsueee-kei Ikiri Tenseisha ni Kamaseinu ni sare Tsuzuketa Elite Kishi, Chou Gureru.

altTitles.en: IseGure: After Constantly Being Used as a Foil for OP Isekai Protagonists, The Elite Knight Has Finally Had It.

description.en:
“I'm not just a foil!”

In order to stop more people from reincarnating into his world, the former elite knight leader sets out on a mission!

An unprecedented comedy about preventing any and all reincarnation is about to begin!

title.en: Become the Strongest Hero Through the Cheat System

altTitles.ja: チートシステムで最強勇者に成り上がる

altTitles.ja-ro: Cheat System de Saikyou Yuusha ni Nariagaru

description.en:
In a world overrun by monsters known as "Darklings," a young man named Tsuyoshi, who lost his parents, was making a living by scavenging items to support himself and his younger sister. However, one day, upon finding a strange item called the "Boundless Ring," Tsuyoshi was suddenly transported to another world, where he found himself on the brink of being executed by beastmen!

But just as his soul cried out, "I don't want to die" and "I want to be a hero," the "Boundless Ring" began to glow, granting him an incredibly powerful body and he got his hands on the beastmen's sacred treasure, the "Divine Hammer." Witnessing this turn of events, the King of the beastmen declared a challenge. If Tsuyoshi could train himself and become the hope of the beastmen within a year, he would be spared from execution. He already has no other way left than to move forward and grow stronger.

Can Tsuyoshi survive and thrive in this otherworld, overcoming the trials that await him?

title.en: Hazure Zokusei "Hikari Mahou" ga Kakusei Shite Laser ga Demashita

altTitles.ja: ハズレ属性「光魔法」が覚醒してレーザーが出ました【タテヨミ】

altTitles.ja-ro: Hazure Zokusei Hikari Mahou ga Kakusei Shite Laser ga Demashita (Tatecomi)

altTitles.en: I Awakened the Garbage Attribute "Light Magic" and a Laser Came Out

description.en:
The day of the "Attribute" assessment when you turn 10.
A boy raised in an orphanage, dreaming of becoming an adventurer—Light was granted the rare attribute of Light, which appears once in every 1,000 people.

However, while it was rare, the Light attribute was called a "failure attribute."
...Because the light magic learned from the Light attribute had absolutely no offensive power!

──Eventually, Light, who had become the adventurer he had always dreamed of, was mocked as the "specialist in parasitism" and the "walking torch," but he continued to train his Light magic to the extreme.

Then, when he reached the near-max level of [Light] attribute at Level 9──.
After his training, with an immense amount of magical power, his childhood friend Saya appeared and requested to accompany him to an AAA difficulty dungeon...

Little did he know, this would turn into the worst expedition of his life...
description.ja:
10歳でうける『属性』診断の日。
孤児院で育ち、冒険者を夢見る少年・ライトは、1000人に１人の確立で出るというレア属性【光】を授かった。
しかし、レアではあるが光属性は『ハズレ属性』と呼ばれていた。
冒険者を夢見るライトにとっては、致命的なレア属性【光】。
それでも、夢をあきらめず、冒険者となったライトは……

description.en: The story of three street children, Chamcham, Stella and Ozaki, seeking to change the world tied to adult rules.
description.es-la: Siguiendo la vida diaria de un par de chicas que no les gusta seguir las reglas

description.en:
From classmates to brother and sister, living under the same roof.

After his father’s remarriage, Asamura Yuuta ends up getting a new stepsister, coincidentally the number one beauty of the school year, Ayase Saki. Having learned important values when it comes to man-woman relationships through the previous ones of their parents, they promise each other not to be too close, not to be too opposing, and to merely keep a vague and comfortable distance.

On one hand, Saki, who has worked in solitude for the sake of her family, doesn’t know how to properly rely on others, whereas Yuta is unsure of how to really treat her. Standing on fairly equal ground, these two slowly learn the comfortable sensation of living together.

Their relationship slowly evolves from being strangers the more the days pass. Eventually, this could end up in a story about love for all we know.
description.pt-br:
De colegas de classe a irmão e irmã, vivendo sob o mesmo teto.

Após o novo casamento de seu pai, Asamura Yuuta acaba ganhando uma nova meia-irmã, coincidentemente a beleza número um do ano escolar, Ayase Saki. Tendo aprendido valores importantes no que diz respeito aos relacionamentos homem-mulher através dos anteriores de seus pais, eles prometem um ao outro não ser muito próximos, não ser muito opostos e apenas manter uma distância vaga e confortável.

Por um lado, Saki, que trabalhou sozinha pelo bem de sua família, não sabe como confiar adequadamente nos outros, enquanto Yuta não tem certeza de como realmente tratá-la. Estando em terreno bastante igual, os dois aprendem lentamente a sensação confortável de viver juntos.

O relacionamento deles evolui lentamente de estranhos à medida que os dias passam. Eventualmente, isso pode acabar em uma história sobre o amor, pelo que sabemos.

altTitles.es-la: Registros de la Secta de la Espada Blanca

description.en:
Frozen human? A martial arts supreme leader the world never knew! The slumbering Strange Master awakens!

After falling unconscious due to an unexpected accident, he wakes up to find that thirty years have passed. During that time, his sect, the White Sword Sect, has fallen into decline and was destroyed by the martial world’s forces. He learns the tragic news that Jin yeongrim, his senior and the sect leader, has met a grim end.

The man whose mere presence made the martial arts world tremble—Sword Master Yu Jangryeong.
His legacy has been entirely inherited by a man the world has never known—Ja Un-hyun.

In this unfamiliar world, where his loved ones are now part of the past, Ja Un-hyun transcends conventions and life-and-death struggles. With his unpredictable eccentricity and unparalleled martial arts skills, he embarks on a thrilling, action-packed journey filled with laughter and boldness.

“If there existed a tainted being among the hwarangs, who would it be? Of course, it’d be Seol Yeong-rang who uses sorcery to call upon spirits!”

Hwarang Seol Yeong, who was named as the tainted person who’d bring forth a great disaster one day.

There was only one way to get rid of the false accusations and return to his rightful position.

It was to prove he wasn’t tainted by evil spirits by solving abnormal incidents.

Then, Zaha, the governor of the previous generation’s hwarang, the man who killed a Great Chaotic God eight years back and disappeared without a trace, appeared in front of Seol Yeong…
description.fr:
« S’il existait un horrible fantôme parmi les Hwarangs, qui serait-il ? Bien sûr, ce serait Seol Yeong qui utilise la nécromancie pour invoquer les fantômes ! »

Hwarang Seol Yeong, qui avait été désigné comme l’horrible fantôme qui provoquerait un jour un grand désastre.

Il n’y avait qu’un seul moyen de se débarrasser de ces fausses accusations et de retrouver sa position initiale.

Il devait prouver qu’il n’était pas un horrible fantôme en résolvant des incidents anormaux.

C’est alors que Ja Ha, le chef du Hwarang de la génération précédente, l’homme qui a tué un grand esprit maléfique huit ans auparavant et qui a disparu sans laisser de traces, apparaît devant Seol Yeong…

description.en: Shimada is a ruthless criminal responsible for indiscriminate mass murder, who later resorts to cannibalism. Nagumo, a police officer, is assigned to escort him, heightening the tension. But what unfolds inside the escort vehicle, packed with criminals, marks the beginning of an unimaginable terror—a new kind of immersive survival horror.

title.en: Why I Quit Being the Demon King

altTitles.id: Alasan Mengapa Aku Berhenti Jadi Raja Iblis

description.en:
In a time of chaos, the Demon King traversed through 665 realms before invading the human realm. It was a brave hero who ceased the war. Thanks to their divine sacrifice, mankind barely managed to survive.

But that led to the story of the new Demon King.

Meet Demon King Demiourgos, the 666th. “I quit being the Demon King,” he said, before leaving the demon realm. This is a story about a runaway Demon King and a hero who becomes his subordinate.

Why did the Demon King quit?

altTitles.ja: サカモト デイズ カラー版

description.en: Taro Sakamoto was the ultimate assassin, feared by villains and admired by hitmen. But one day…he fell in love! Retirement, marriage, fatherhood and then… Sakamoto gained weight! The chubby guy who runs the neighborhood store is actually a former legendary hitman! Can he protect his family from danger? Get ready to experience a new kind of action comedy series!

altTitles.en: Killing Blooms Under the Rounded Moon
Saku Kills on the Full Moon
Sword-Slicing Blossoms When the Moon is Full

description.en: A new transfer student has come into town, a girl with a mysterious air and black clothing who is called Inugami Sakuya. What few know is that by moonlight, she hunts and kills those possessed by "Inugami." A man can become possessed by being bitten, leading to a nighttime transformation into a beast driven to eat women. Sakuya gets no thanks for brutally ending the lives of these unfortunate men with her sword, and she is often too late to save the women they threaten. Sakuya also must deal with her own inner demons, which are all too real…
description.pt-br: Sakuya Inugami é uma misteriosa garota que caça seres chamados Inugami, homens que se transformam em terríveis feras comedoras de mulheres, após serem mordidos. Nessa difícil missão, Sakuya não recebe nenhum agradecimento e pior, tem que enfrentar seus próprios demônios internos.

title.en: Imprisoned with the Horror Game's Male Lead

altTitles.en: Confined Together with the Horror Game’s Male Lead

altTitles.es-la: Me convertí en la sirvienta del protagonista de un juego de terror

description.en:
I became a maid inside of a horror game.
Penalties were given to the male lead, who was trying to escape being locked up in a large mansion, and I acted as a guide. 

I was going to fulfill my duties until the male lead’s play ends.

“When I get out, I’ll lock you up exactly the same way.”

The male lead is so noisy. 
If it’s going to be like this, I’ll just help him escape faster. 

“Let’s eat, Dietrich.”
“This is a potion, it’ll help you recover faster if you take it.”
“The hint to escape is over there…”

I fed him well to prepare for the next play, and when the male lead got hurt, I gave him a potion so he could quickly play the next game,
I even gave him a hint for the problem. 

You’ll be able to get out now, right?

However. 

“I don’t really know the answer.”

What’s the meaning of this? Aren’t you supposed to be smart?

…The male lead doesn’t think about leaving the mansion at all. 

“If you won’t get out, I will.”

I shouted in anger because I was so sick of the thought of having to see the face of someone I don’t want to keep seeing. 

“Is it possible for you to get out of here?”

His eyes sank bitterly. 

“Let me tell you this, I have no intention of leaving this place.”
“What?”
“And you have no way of getting out, either.”

What the hell is going on?

Stowing himself away on a slave ship, Julian sets sail for the great continent with a hundred slaves, all yearning for freedom, until...?! Embark on a groundbreaking journey through this action-packed dark fantasy saga!!
description.ru: Пробравшись на невольничий корабль, Юлиан отправляется на континент вместе с сотней рабов, жаждущих свободы... Но что ждёт его впереди?!
description.vi: Lén đi lậu trên một con tàu, Julian ra đi tìm đến đại lục cùng với một trăm người nô lệ khác... Ai ai cũng khao khát có được tự do, thế nhưng rồi...?!

description.en:
Combination is a police story about two very different men becoming partners to fight crimes in high places. Their combination turns out to be one-of-a-kind.  
  
The story is based on the adventures of a pair of policemen, Hashiba Shigemi 26 years old and Keiichi Sasaki, 22. The two handsome young men are somewhat nonconformist and often act of impulse; especially the impetious Hashiba. They solve crimes with "less-than-orthodox" methods and push themselves to the limits of the legality; Often engaging themselves more on hunches and "faith" than for the same law; but after all they are the best "Combination" that can be found. thus the title of the series. They prefere to take action against the politically corrupt and the dealings of the yakuza. The Japanese Robin Hood?

Volumes 1-2 were produced under CLAMP. After Sei Leeza left CLAMP she finished the rest on her own.

title.en: Make the Exorcist Fall in Love

altTitles.ja: エクソシストを堕とせない

altTitles.th: เอ็กซอร์ซิส ไม่มีวันตกหลุมรัก

altTitles.fr: Make the Exorcist Fall in Love

description.en: As the strongest exorcist, a boy chosen by God was engaged in mortal combat with the Demon Kings. Although he bears the fate of humanity on his shoulders, he actually wants to make sweets peacefully. One day, he meets a girl... This is a story of love and hope growing in the midst of a holy war.
description.fr: Un jeune prêtre, entraîné par le Vatican pour devenir l'exorciste le plus puissant du monde, reçoit pour mission divine de protéger une jeune artiste, Imuri Atsuki. Sur les conseils de son mentor, il espère néanmoins trouver l'amour afin de soulager son esprit du lourd fardeau qui lui incombe. Imuri sera-t-elle celle qui lui apportera son salut ?
description.ja: 神に選ばれし少年は、最強のエクソシストとして魔王たちと死闘を繰り広げていた。人類の命運を背負いつつも本当は静かにお菓子作りをしていたい、そんな彼に訪れた一人の少女との出会い…。これは壮絶な聖戦の中で芽吹いた、恋と希望の物語。

description.en:
A hitman and a marriage swindler set out on the world’s most grueling battle for marriage!

Gero is a young man from a clan of hitmen, which has been in existence for hundreds of years. As someone who’s never gone to school and lived his life dealing in the dark side of the business, he considers himself to have “no prospects with women” and marriage as “something not for him.”

However, one day, in fear that their lineage would dissolve, his clan warns Gero that if he doesn’t marry and produce an heir, they would have no choice but to…force his little sister into doing “that.” Driven to his wits’ end, Gero asks the target of his work, a marriage swindler, to…

------
- [Official English Volumes at Viz Media](https://www.viz.com/marriage-toxin)
description.ja: <毎週水曜更新>殺し屋×結婚詐欺師の世界一ハードな婚活バトル物語！数百年続く殺し屋一族の青年・下呂。学校にも行かず裏稼業で生きてきた彼にとって女性は「苦手で縁遠いもの」であり、結婚は「するべきではないもの」と考えていた。だがある日、血が絶えることを恐れた彼の実家は、下呂が結婚し子供を残さないならば、妹に「それ」を強制することを通告。困り果てた下呂は仕事のターゲットであった結婚詐欺師に…。
description.pt-br:
Um assassino de aluguel e uma vigarista de casamentos partem na batalha mais cansativa do mundo! 

Gero é um jovem de um clã de assassinos, que existe há centenas de anos. Como alguém que nunca foi à escola e viveu sua vida lidando com o lado sombrio do negócio, ele se considera “sem perspectivas com mulheres” e o casamento é “algo que não é para ele”. No entanto, um dia, com medo de que sua linhagem se dissolva, seu clã avisa Gero que, se ele não se casar e ter um herdeiro, eles não terão escolha a não ser… forçar sua irmãzinha a fazer “isso”. Levado ao extremo, Gero pede ao alvo de seu trabalho, uma vigarista de casamento, para que...

title.en: Why Are You Obsessed With Your Fake Wife?

altTitles.pl: Dlaczego Masz Obsesję na Punkcie Swojej Fałszywej Żony?

description.en:
"You'd better not even dream of being recognized as my wife. There will never be an heir from a daughter of Balajit.”

Nadia couldn't agree more with his opinion.
Thank you, Marquis, be sure to keep your word.

“The Marquis said you had no intention of sleeping with me.”
“… … .”
“So, to ensure an heir, there's no other choice but to take a concubine... … .”

Nadia's head jerked at the sound of something crushing on her.
Then, out of the corner of her eyes, she saw that the table her husband was working on had cracked.

No, why did it suddenly break?
description.ko:
“내 아내로 인정받을 망상 따위 꿈에도 하지 않는 게 좋을 거다. 내가 발라지트의 딸에게서 후사를 볼 일은 영영 없을 테니.”

나디아는 하마터면 나도 같은 생각이라고 맞장구칠 뻔했다.

감사합니다, 후작놈아.
자기 입으로 한 말은 꼭 지키세요.

***

“후작님께서 저와 합방을 할 의사가 없다고 하셨거든요.”
“…….”
“그러니 후계를 위해선 어쩔 수 없이 첩을 들이는 수밖에…….”

콰직.
무언가 으스러지는 소리에 나디아의 고개가 홱 돌아갔다.
그러자 남편이 짚은 테이블의 한 구석에 금이 간 모습이 보인다.

아니, 저게 갑자기 왜 부서져?
description.pl:
"Lepiej, żebyś nie marzyła o uznaniu cię za moją żonę. Nigdy nie miałbym następcy z córką Balazita".
Słysząc to, Nadia prawie powiedziała: "Czuję to samo".
Dziękuję ci, markizie. Mam nadzieję, że dotrzymasz swoich słów.
***
"Powiedziałeś, że nie masz zamiaru dzielić ze mną łoża".
"..."
"Więc dla dobra następcy wiem, że nie masz innego wyboru, jak sprowadzić konkubinę..."
pęknięcie
Głowa Nadii odwróciła się na ten dźwięk.
W następnej chwili widzi, pęknięcie w rogu stołu, przy którym był jej mąż.
To znaczy, dlaczego ten stół nagle się złamał?

title.en: The Young Lady I Served Became a Young Master

altTitles.en: The Lady I Served Became a Master
The Lady I Served Has Become a Master

altTitles.uk: Леді, Якій Я Служила, Стала Господарем

altTitles.mn: Миний Үйлчилж Байсан Залуу Авхай, Залуу Ноёнтон Болсон нь

altTitles.ja: 仕えたお嬢様がお坊ちゃまになった

altTitles.th: คุณหนูที่เคยรับใช้กลายเป็นคุณชายไปซะแล้ว

altTitles.zh: 我服侍的小姐变成了少爷？

altTitles.id: Nona yang Kulayani Jadi Tuan Muda

altTitles.vi: Vị tiểu thư tôi từng theo hầu đã trở thành thiếu gia

description.de:
Als Sua eines Tages in der Welt ihres Lieblingsromans in der Rolle von Blair aufwacht, ist sie fest entschlossen, dem weiblichen Hauptcharakter Chloe zu helfen, die schwierigste Phase ihres Lebens zu überstehen. Seit Jahren wird Chloe diskriminiert und misshandelt, weil sie ein uneheliches Kind ist. Blair wird zu ihrem Dienstmädchen und zu ihrer Vertrauten und die zwei entwickeln eine besondere Freundschaft. Aber es stellt sich heraus, dass Chloe völlig anders ist, als im eigentlichen Roman dargestellt. Sie benutzt schwarze Magie, beauftragt Blair, ihr mysteriöse Tränke zu besorgen, und scheint keinerlei Interesse an den männlichen Hauptcharakteren zu haben. Dann erscheint eines Tages ein gut aussehender Mann vor Blairs Haustür, der Chloe zum Verwechseln ähnlich sieht. Könnte das ... die Lady sein, der sie gedient hat?! Alles scheint möglich, als die Geschichte von Liebe und Erlösung eine überraschende Wendung nach der anderen nimmt.

---

description.en:
It has been four years since the original heroine ended her life as a maid. A handsome man came to see her. He was a man who looked like the young lady that she used to serve.

"I'm here to keep my promise, Blair. You said that you'd be with me for the rest of your life."

"No way… Young Miss?"

At that moment, the man's crimson eyes turned to meet mine. He bent down till our noses nearly touched and kissed my hair.

And whispered — in a very sweet and beautiful voice —

"You have to call me Young Master now."

…Huh?

---
When Su-A wakes up inside the world of her favorite novel as the character of Blair, she is determined to help the female protagonist, Chloe, get through the darkest period of her life. 

For years, Chloe has had to endure discrimination and abuse for being an illegitimate child. Blair becomes her maid and confidante, and the two form a special friendship. But Chloe turns out to be quite a different character than the one described in the book. She wields black magic, sends Blair to fetch her mysterious potions, and seems totally uninterested in any of the male lead candidates. Then one day, a handsome man who looks an awful lot like Chloe shows up at Blair’s doorstep. Could it be…the lady she used to serve?! 

All bets are off as plot twist after plot twist unravels in this unpredictable tale of love and redemption.

---
**Original Novel:** [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=52553678), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=5440800), [RidiBooks](https://ridibooks.com/books/2107059249)

description.fr:
Lorsque Sua se réveille soudain dans le monde de son roman préféré, dans le corps du personnage de Blair, elle est bien décidée à aider l’héroïne de l’histoire, Chloé, à surmonter la période la plus sombre de sa vie. Pendant des années, Chloé a dû endurer discrimination et abus, simplement parce qu’elle est une enfant illégitime. Blair devient alors sa servante et confidente, et une amitié toute particulière se forme. Mais voilà que Chloé s’avère être bien différente du personnage décrit dans le roman… Elle pratique la magie noire, envoie Blair chercher de mystérieuses potions, et semble totalement inintéressée par les personnages masculins qui l’entourent. Puis un beau jour, un charmant jeune homme ressemblant extrêmement à Chloé fait son apparition devant la porte de Blair. Se pourrait-il vraiment que ce soit… la demoiselle qu’elle servait? C’est ce qu’il reste à découvrir dans cette histoire d’amour et de rédemption pleine de retournements et d’imprévus!

description.ru:
*Это не юри!*

Я не работала горничной уже 4 года. Но однажды у моего дома неожиданно появился красивый мужчина, очень похожий на леди, которой я когда-то служила.

-Я приехал, чтобы исполнить обещание. Ты говорила, что останешься со мной навсегда.

-Не может быть… Госпожа?

В этот момент его красные глаза слегка округлились. Он наклонил голову, поцеловал локон моих волос и нежно прошептал:

-Теперь зови меня "господин."

description.vi:
Khi tỉnh dậy trong thế giới của cuốn tiểu thuyết yêu thích với tư cách là Blair, nữ chính đã quyết tâm giúp Chloe, nữ chính nguyên tác vượt qua thời kỳ đen tối nhất trong cuộc đời cô. Chloe đã phải chịu sự kỳ thị và ngược đãi vì là con ngoài giá thú nhiều năm liền. Blair trở thành người giúp việc và người bạn tâm giao của cô, giữa hai người sau đó hình thành một tình bạn đặc biệt. Nhưng Chloe hóa ra là một nhân vật hoàn toàn khác so với những gì được mô tả trong cuốn sách. Cô ấy sử dụng ma thuật đen, cử Blair đi lấy những lọ thuốc bí ẩn. Ngoài ra, Chloe dường như hoàn toàn không quan tâm đến bất kỳ ứng cử viên nam chính nào. Đến một ngày, một người đàn ông đẹp trai trông rất giống Chloe xuất hiện trước cửa nhà Blair. Người đó… là cô tiểu thư Blair từng phục vụ đó sao?!

---

description.en: Anyway, I'm gonna dote on her.
description.pt-br: A história de uma garota que foi abandonada por sua família, e foi adotada por outra.

description.en:
Humanity was designated as a disruptive species of the Cosmic Ecosystem. To reduce humanity's numbers, the universe's administrators initiate a survival game.

Jin Jaehee, having returned from the final stage of the game, reaches one clear conclusion.

"Kang Shion - only he can lead us to victory in this game."

Kang Shion, a genius with an unparalleled mind. Jin Jaehee, a regressor who lost in the survival game and returned to the past.

With the regressor as his ally, Kang Shion begins to unravel the death game with unprecedented skill.
description.ko:
우주생태교란종으로 선정된 인류. 우주의 관리자에 의해 인간의 개체수를 줄이기 위한 생존 게임이 시작된다.

그 최종 단계에서 회귀한 진재희는 한가지 결론을 내린다.

“강시온, 오직 그만이 이 게임을 승리로 이끌 수 있어.”

천재적인 두뇌의 소유자, 강시온. 생존 게임에서 패배해 과거로 돌아온 회귀자, 진재희.

회귀자를 조력자로 얻게 된 강시온은 역대급 능력으로 데스 게임을 풀어나간다.
